speaker: Gary Pretty
title: Learn how to build bots with Azure Bot Service's comprehensive development experience
description:
On this episode from our #MSBuild recap, Gary Pretty is back to showcase the very latest in Azure Bot Service (https://aka.ms/AIShow/ConversationalAI/Build2021) and demo how to build and deploy your bot in just a few steps!
